attributes.action: please re-educate Ministers of the Crown in the pronunciation of the letter 't' between vowels and at the ends of words. This patronising demotic affectation was forgivable among the politically ambitious when it was adopted by the prime minister of the day, but now it is an obtrusive aberration from natural speech patterns. Please start with Liam Byrne, Jacqui Smith and David Miliband.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
